name: stock_tracker
description: Real-time stock market prices and changes
author: ThemeParkAPI Framework

api_key.description: API key for stock data service (e.g., Alpha Vantage, IEX Cloud)

requirements.api_key: Stock market API key required (e.g., Alpha Vantage, IEX Cloud, Yahoo Finance)
requirements.rate_limits: Be aware of API rate limits - typically 5-500 requests per minute depending on service

example_usage:
from cpyapp.apps import SimpleScrollApp

# Basic usage (you'll need to provide an API key)
app = SimpleScrollApp.from_preset('stock_tracker', 
                                 api_key='YOUR_API_KEY',
                                 symbols=['AAPL', 'TSLA', 'GOOGL'])
app.run()

# Show volume information
app = SimpleScrollApp.from_preset('stock_tracker',
                                 api_key='YOUR_API_KEY',
                                 show_volume=True,
                                 format='detailed')
app.run()

# Update more frequently (every minute)
app = SimpleScrollApp.from_preset('stock_tracker',
                                 api_key='YOUR_API_KEY',
                                 update_interval=60)
app.run()
